Package suncertify.network

Interface Summary
DBRemote This interface acts as a remote interface for the remote DB interface.
NetworkClientFactory This class represents the client network factory which has the methods that can be called remotely.
 

Class Summary
DataRemote This class represents the RMI implementation of the DBRemote interface.
NetworkClient This class is the implementation of the client network factory which returns clients with connectivity to the database.
NetworkConnector This class is static factory and is used by the client to get a connection to the remote database.
RegisterDatabase Creates an RMI registration on the client machine for the remote database object using the RMI naming service.
RemoteAdapter This class is the implementation of the adapter pattern which is used to provied the implementation of the two interfaces DB and that could not be implemented in the same class, due to the restrictions of subclassing with more checked exceptions of its interfaces.
ServerStarter The objects from this class start the server which accepts network connections via RMI.
